name: The Darkness (itch) (Devil Kitty Games)
description:
Search for medicine and bring it back to your loved one.  Don't take too long though, every second counts in The Darkness.

We had a lot of fun creating this  for the Brackeys Game Jam #2 (Theme - Love is blind).

WASD to move

Walk over medicine to pick it up

Space to give to your loved one.

Have fun!
